TopicTitle: Hydrogen fuel from "Near Future Technologies" for "Procedural Parts"

Articles.Content:
Hello,i need help to create a Hydrogen fuel tank in the "Procedural Parts" mod.Can anyone help me?

Thanks.

Do you have ModularFuelTanks installed and what tanks are you wanting to use ?

EDIT- You can try this it's for with out ModularFuelTanks and using the Xenon tank part and didn't know if you wanted LiquidHydrogen or HydrogenGas so there both in https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/NearFuture_ProceduralParts.zip

Edited November 23, 2014 by Mecripp2

It worked.It was the Liguid Hydrogen one.Thanks.

The other is for Universal Storage?

If you want the other tank it would be just a editted file or let me know.

Edited November 23, 2014 by Mecripp2

Thank you,maybe now with an example i can manage to replicate those by myself

I think...
